sentence.Network_en: The general ordered the bugler to sound the retreat.
sentence.Network_cn: 将军命令号手吹号收兵.

sentence.Network_en: There was nothing faded about the bugler under the cap.
sentence.Network_cn: 帽子下面那个号手可一点也不是褪色的.

sentence.Network_en: The little bugler bravely squared up to his enemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 小号手英勇地面对敌人.

一些翻译~（转的~） ... bugle 军号 bugler 号手 burial service 葬礼.
人物词汇专辑45-英语文章阅读-大耳朵英语 -... ... ogler 做眉眼的人 bugler 号兵 jailer 看守监狱的人，狱卒.
第150分队(中级组奖章) ... 乐员 Bandsman 军号 Bugler 通讯 Communication.

list.abs: The bugler sounded off ., 号兵吹起了军号.

a bugler stands among stones as he plays " Taps " during the funeral ceremony for Retired Maj. Gen. David Wherley and his wife Ann at Arlington National Cemetery June 30 , 2009 .一个喇叭手在阿林顿国家公墓里站在墓基中央为退休的少将DavidWherley和他夫人在葬礼典礼上吹奏丧葬号音。
there was nothing faded about the bugler under the cap .帽子下面那个号手可一点也不是褪色的。

Mr. Maliki then laid a wreath on the tomb of the unknown soldier as an army bugler played to commemorate Iraqi troops that have died in the service of their country .当军队号兵开始演奏纪念为国家牺牲的伊拉克部队时，马利基在阵亡的无名英雄的墓前安放了花圈。

entry.def: A bugler is someone who plays the bugle.

auth_sentence.content: Seven soldiers fired three rifle volleys, and a bugler played Taps.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seven soldiers fired three rifle volleys, and a bugler played Taps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seven soldiers fired three rifle volleys, and a bugler played Taps.

auth_sentence.content: Hymns were sung and prayers said in remembrance of New Zealand's fallen, before a bugler played the Last Post.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hymns were sung and prayers said in remembrance of New Zealand's fallen, before a bugler played the Last Post.

auth_sentence.content: Midway through the bugler begins slowly walking away, letting the music softly fade out in the distance.
